definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: These small nations constitute an important grouping within the EU.
sentences.chinese: 這些小國家是歐盟中的一個重要小集團。

sentences.english: "The gang of four" was an ambitious political Clique.
sentences.chinese: “四人幫”是個野心勃勃的政治小集團。

sentences.english: I'm the only girl in my school group.
sentences.chinese: 在學校，我是我們小集團中唯一的女孩。

sentences.english: A small cabal of politicians almost certainly stole the result by fraud (see article).
sentences.chinese: 一個政客小集團通過欺騙幾乎完全竊取了勝利果實。

sentences.english: According to Mancur Olson"s, small groups are more powerful than big groups."
sentences.chinese: 根據奧爾森的理論，小集團比大集團有力量。

sentences.english: Communication with non combatants and members of factions present in the area are essential for success.
sentences.chinese: 與非戰鬥人員以及小集團的成員的交流是成功的根本。
